name: Red Fox Web Technologies
description:
We are a website design & development, mobile app and digital marketing company with our presence in New York and back-office development center in India. We offer a bird's eye view for all your digital needs right from branding (i.e. logo design, brand identity) to create a customized web presence for your business. We also offer mobile application development on iPhone, Android, and Windows Mobile.
Our online marketing includes app store optimization, Search & Social Media Marketing.
